info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 5 at 2:52PM EDT until June 8 at 11:26PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River at Elliston.
White River at Edwardsport.
White River at Newberry.
Wabash River at Lafayette.
.Rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches across west-central Indiana will produce minor flooding along portions of the Wabash and White rivers. River flooding should begin Friday.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Elliston.
* WHEN...From late tonight to late Sunday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River Road north of CR 150 W in Greene County is flooded. Low agricultural fields flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 20.4 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Friday morning by around 600 AM EDT /500 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Greene, IN; Knox, IN
